segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, towel in hand, drying a plate methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water flows steadily, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over gently onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A stool is positioned near the open cabinet on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on it, arm extended into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate with his other hand carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close by, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, revealing a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, that stool does look a bit unsteadyâ€”hope it holds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, but no one reacts yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary day with a hint of unexpected trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
